title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 102.4 - Letter of intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 102.4 - Letter of intent

State Regulations

Upon approval of an application, the board shall issue a
letter of intent informing the applicant that, if there is compliance with the
provisions of section 118 of the Commerce Law, a certificate of eligibility for
tax credits or a certificate of eligibility for real property tax exemptions, or both, shall be issued. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
102.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
